actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to clarify and extend the temporary duty reduction on cellulose nitrate.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 2011, the duty on cellulose nitrate (in powder form only, excluding collodions) with a nitrogen content of 12.2% by weight or less.

titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to clarify and extend the temporary duty reduction on cellulose nitrate.
